name: NEAR777
description:
Derivative of https://twitter.com/thesevens_7
Pixel DOOMSLUG by https://twitter.com/drOMGp
Celebrating https://twitter.com/NEARProtocol
Created by https://twitter.com/starpause
Part of the #OBJKT4OBJKT September, 2021 giveaway.

‣ $NEAR is a carbon neutral L1 blockchain with NFT royalties and splits implemented at the standards level. 
‣ The web wallet with responsive UI shows your NFTs on mobile/tablet/desktop. 
‣ 1 second block time makes web3 dApps feel snappy and ready for adoption by the next billion users migrating from web2. 
‣ The NEAR ecosystem has over 100 DAOs where you can earn crypto with your skills. 
‣ Welcome to a world where people have control over their money, data, and power of governance!

NEAR relies on its own variant of BFT consensus, known as DOOMSLUG. It facilitates sub-second block production and recovers the network from malicious or unresponsive validators. 💪😎💨 DOOMSLUG is also a mascot that accompanies Spensa Nightshade in Skyward. She's known to replicate nearly any sound she hears. 🐌🎶

I made this NFT as part of a derivatives challenge on thesevens discord but didn't get approved for presale. After that I wasted $30 on ETH GAS trying to snag the drop and consider myself lucky, there were people who lost hundreds/thousands and walked away empty handed. I'm fed up with PoW so enjoy my art on PoS for free ✌

Materials: Photoshop, waifu2x, PNGGauntlet
